closed_reason: Increased DefaultAgentTimeout from 5 minutes to 30 minutes in internal/engine/engine.go. Also updated the RunConfig comment and the test assertion in engine_test.go.
description: Current 5 minute default is too short for complex tasks. Increase DefaultAgentTimeout to 30 minutes in internal/engine/engine.go.

run.output:
I'll start by reading the current engine.go file to understand the current timeout configuration and make the necessary change.

I can see the current configuration. The `DefaultAgentTimeout` is set to `5 * time.Minute` on line 70. I need to change it to `30 * time.Minute`. Let me also update the comment on line 54 that references this default.

Now let me run the tests to make sure everything still passes.

There's a test that checks for the old default value. I need to update the test to expect 30 minutes instead of 5 minutes.

Now let me run the tests again to confirm they pass.

All tests pass. Now let me close the task, commit the changes, and add an epic note.

Task complete. I increased the `DefaultAgentTimeout` from 5 minutes to 30 minutes in `internal/engine/engine.go:70`, updated the corresponding comment on line 54, and fixed the test assertion in `internal/engine/engine_test.go:356`. All engine tests pass.

title: Increase default agent timeout to 30 minutes
